Package org.jungrapht.visualization.spatial.rtree

Class LeafNode<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jungrapht.visualization.spatial.rtree.RTreeNode<T>
      • org.jungrapht.visualization.spatial.rtree.LeafNode<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Bounded, Node<T>, TreeNode
    public class LeafNode<T>
extends RTreeNode<T>
implements Node<T>
    a leaf node of an R-Tree. Contains a map of elements to their 2d bounds
    Author:
    Tom Nelson
